full_summary:
# Cultus Lake Laboratory Sanitary System Upgrades

Announcement of Solicitation
==========================

*   Solicitation Reference: WS3855662648-Doc3931064518
*   Solicitation Number: WS3855662648
*   Publication Date: March 22, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: April 26, 2023 at 2:00 p.m.
*   Solicitation Amendment: 5 (Last Amended: April 14, 2023)

Project Overview
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking contractors to bid on the Phase 2 improvement project of the Cultus Lake Laboratory Sanitary System Upgrades.

The scope of work involves plumbing system maintenance and repair services for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) located at the Cultus Lake Laboratory.

Performance Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
-----------------------------------------------

The submitted tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

Pre-Qualification Process
------------------------

Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

Bidding Requirements and Instructions
-------------------------------------

The tendering process involves a selective tendering method.

List of Interested Suppliers
-----------------------------

Only contractors with experience in plumbing system maintenance or repair, and plumbing construction services, are eligible to participate in this tender.

Trade Agreements
----------------

The PSPC is undertaking this project under the framework of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Location of Work
-----------------

The work is to be performed in the province of British Columbia.

Contracting Organization
-----------------------

The contracting organization is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the end-user is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

Contact Information
-------------------

Janie Leung (elle-la / she-her) of the PSPC/SPAC.

for further information, please reach out to [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Key Dates
----------

*   Contract Award (anticipated): After April 26, 2023
*   Contract Start Date (anticipated): May 15, 2023
*   Contract End Date (anticipated): December 15, 2023

Eligibility and Participation
-----------------------------

Only qualified suppliers with the required certifications, licenses, and experience will be allowed to bid. Evaluation and selection of bidders will be based on the criteria outlined above.
